Title: Relates to the monetary penalties for the crime of aggravated harassment or for discrimination
Summary: Increases the monetary penalties for the crimes of aggravated harassment in the first or second degrees or for discrimination; provides that such penalty shall be not less than five hundred dollars nor more than twenty-five hundred dollars for the first violation and not less than twenty-five hundred dollars nor more than twelve thousand five hundred dollars for each subsequent violation.
LawCode: Amd ยง40-d, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to increasing the monetary and criminal penalties for aggravated harassment or discrimination
